Class MovieController

java.lang.Object
com.javaoop.movie_booking_app.controller.MovieController
@Controller @RequestMapping("/movie") public class MovieController extends Object
Controller responsible for displaying movie information and associated showtimes.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    MovieController(MovieService movieService, ShowtimeService showtimeService)
    Constructor-based dependency injection of movie and showtime services.

  • Constructor Details

    • MovieController

      @Autowired public MovieController(MovieService movieService, ShowtimeService showtimeService)
      Constructor-based dependency injection of movie and showtime services.
      Parameters:
      movieService - the service for handling movie-related logic
      showtimeService - the service for handling showtime-related logic

  • Method Details

    • getAllMovies

      @GetMapping public String getAllMovies(org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Handles request to display all active movies.
      Parameters:
      model - the model to pass movie data to the view
      Returns:
      the name of the view that displays the movie list

    • getShowTimesOfMovie

      @GetMapping("/{movieId}/showtime") public String getShowTimesOfMovie(@PathVariable("movieId") Long movieId, org.springframework.ui.Model model, org.springframework.web.servlet.mvc.support.RedirectAttributes redirectAttributes)
      Displays showtimes for a specific movie by movie ID.
      Parameters:
      movieId - the ID of the movie to view showtimes for
      model - the model to pass movie and showtime data
      redirectAttributes - attributes for passing error messages across redirects
      Returns:
      the name of the view showing showtimes or a redirect if movie not found
